person.persName: William Josephus Perrin (Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Solomon C. Perrin. Married to Nancy D. Oldham Perrin in 1851. Attended Bacon College at Harrodsburg, Kentucky, from 1841 to 1842. Served in Humphrey Marshall's cavalry regiment in the Mexican War from 1846 to 1847. Constable of Harrison County from 1849 to 1852. Admitted to the bar in 1857. Attorney in Falmouth, Kentucky, in 1859. Deputy clerk of the Kenton County Court in Covington, Kentucky, from 1860 to 1862.
